title: StockHedges
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 5 European stocks to watch this earnings season as Trump's tariffs hit
items.description: The scale of President Donald Trump's tariffs has exceeded even the most bearish forecasts — and could impact these five major European firms.

items.title: Netflix posts major earnings beat as revenue grows 13% in first quarter
items.description: The report marks the first time Netflix did not disclose quarterly subscriber data, as it shifts its strategy to focus on revenue and other metrics.

items.title: Netflix maintained its 2025 guidance. That may not be the sign of confidence it seems
